biography: Masatoshi Matsuo (松尾 政寿, Matsuo Masatoshi, August 15, 1978) is a former Japanese actor from Fukuoka City, Fukuoka Prefecture. He is 175 cm tall and has a blood type of A. His hobby is soccer and he is an avid supporter of Avispa Fukuoka. He was affiliated with Horipro. In 1996, he won the 9th Junon Superboy Contest prize.
name: Masatoshi Matsuo
